hero.core_tension: Choose between stealing early bargain demand now and protecting margin later. The operator must visibly pick a capture-first, margin-aware path.
hero.setting: In-store planning table. Overhead view of a small team around a matte wood table with sample packaging, promo boards, and a calendar opened to Nov 241 Dec 08.
hero.persona: Head of Retail and Partnerships Director collaborating with a studio lead
hero.action: Pointing at a co-branded limited SKU mockup while tapping a card labeled timed coupon window
hero.urgency_symbol: A mechanical countdown clock showing days left until Nov 24, face lit and slightly out of focus
props: Co-branded product mockup tied to the collab-led holiday play
Timed coupon cards labeled Nov 24 1 Dec 08
Event checklist referencing store events and QR redemption tracking
hero.lighting: Polished editorial lighting with confident highlights on faces and product surfaces, clear negative space behind subjects
hero.alt: Head of Retail selecting a co-branded SKU and timed coupon test

signal_map.structure: Concentric rings with radial lanes and intersecting arcs representing channels and cohorts
elements: Segmented tokens for promo types (discount, co-brand, event)
Small QR icons placed on outer ring
signal_map.motion: Inward flow from outer channels into the early-window core, arrows implied by gradient shifts and token spacing to show capture rate
signal_map.palette: Muted neutrals with single confident highlight color for early-window targets and a warm accent for partner-led plays; materials feel paper and brushed metal
signal_map.alt: CMO viewing rings that map footfall lift and early-window share targets

case_studies.scene: Retail floor treated as studio. A pop-up table with event signage and a staff host scanning QR codes as a line forms.
case_studies.moment: First hour of a timed in-store event that pairs a short coupon window with a live demo to pull visits into Nov 24 1 Dec 08.
case_studies.persona: Store Ops Lead running a store-as-studio event
props: Event signage calling out time-limited offer
Handheld scanner showing live QR redemptions
Small demo kit that doubles as a limited SKU
case_studies.lighting: Directional spotlights on the demo table, soft fill on the queue to emphasize human scale
case_studies.alt: Store Ops Lead running a timed in-store demo and QR redemption test

case_studies.scene: Backroom partnership sprint. Partnership and merchandising teams signing a small run of co-branded packaging beside a launch checklist and digital coupon feed on a tablet.
case_studies.moment: Approval of a limited co-branded SKU plus an online timed coupon to drive early-window share while keeping base prices intact.
case_studies.persona: Partnerships Director approving a co-brand SKU launch
props: Co-branded SKU mockups with partner logo
Tablet showing coupon activation window and cohort targets
Margin impact card summarizing discount depth vs. incremental margin
case_studies.lighting: Clean editorial side light that highlights product texture and printed numbers on the margin card
case_studies.alt: Partnerships Director approving a co-branded SKU and timed coupon test
